TopicTitle: How do I set up a joystick?

Articles.Content: Well, I have one, and after 0.15 came out, I think it will help with flying planes. I just don\'t know where to set it up in the settings.

Go to settings > Input, scroll down towards the bottom to Axis Controls, you should see axis assignments, then click where it says 'none' and move your joystick on the axis you want to control it with.

For the buttons you can map them just like you would the keyboard.

Happy joysticking!
